pages.text: Snailmail is a mailing mod. $(br2)Snailmail allows you to have multiple mailboxes, or snailbox.$(br2)Each snailbox can be named and shared with other players.
Mail is sent to a snailbox. Right click to open the inventory where your mail is stored. $(br2)Mail is also sent $(o)from$() a snailbox
To send mail, you will need an envelope and a stamp! Put the open envelope into the snailbox and press $(l)open envelope$(). Now insert any items you wish to send
Add the username that you wish to send mail to in the $(l)to$() field. Make sure to add a stamp and sign the $(l)from$() field! $(br)Then press send and select the snailbox
